#summary Overview of installation options

= Introduction =

There are four ways you can install !BigBlueButton
    * [BigBlueButtonVM Download the Virtual Machine] (white belt)
    * [InstallationUbuntu Install on Ubuntu (5 minutes)] (yellow belt)
    * [InstallingBigBlueButton Install from source (Ubuntu)] (brown belt)
    * [InstallingBigBlueButtonFedora Install from source (Fedora)] (brown belt)
    * [InstallingBigBlueButtonCentOS Install from source (CentOS)] (brown belt, two black stripes) 
    * Port !BigBlueButton to another OS and contribute the steps to the community (black belt!)

Regardless of the way you choose, the following page shows the configuration files:

   * [ConfigurationFiles Configuration Files]

Finally, if you are upgrading from a previous release, please see [ReleaseNotes Release Notes] on how to upgrade.
